Question: DEEPX CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
DEEPX

Product: All-in-4 AI Total Solution

- Comprises four chips optimized for various edge applications
- Includes DX-V1, DX-V2, DX-M1, and DX-H1
- DX-V1 and DX-V2 are standalone chips specializing in vision systems
- DX-M1 supports real-time AI computation processing for multichannel video
- DX-H1 is an AI inference-type solution for AI servers
- Early Engagement Customer Program (EECP) offers early access to the chips
- Won the CES 2024 Innovation Award in the Embedded Technology category
- Aims to revolutionize AI capabilities and lead the AI era
Summary_cn:
深视科技（DEEPX）

产品：全能四合一AI全解决方案

- 包括四款针对不同边缘应用优化的芯片
- 包括DX-V1、DX-V2、DX-M1和DX-H1
- DX-V1和DX-V2是专注于视觉系统的独立芯片
- DX-M1支持多通道视频的实时AI计算处理
- DX-H1是一种用于AI服务器的AI推理型解决方案
- 早期参与客户计划（EECP）提供对芯片的早期访问权
- 荣获2024年CES创新奖嵌入式技术类别
- 旨在革新AI能力并引领AI时代
